name: Rivet
title: ironcladapp.com
shortDescription: Rivet is a visual programming tool designed for creating and managing AI agents using LLMs. It allows teams to design, debug, and deploy complex LLM prompt graphs within their applications. An example use case includes teams at Ironclad using Rivet to enhance their legal AI capabilities, making contract review processes more efficient and collaborative.
pros: Version control integration with YAML files
cons: May require technical understanding of AI
Potentially high learning curve for non-developers
